lyrics.text: Lesson 6 Smash and Grab
lyrics.translation: 第6课 打砸抢

lyrics.text: Listen to the tape then answer the question below.
lyrics.translation: 听录音，然后回答下面的问题。

lyrics.text: How did Mr. Taylor try to stop the thieves?
lyrics.translation: 泰勒先生是如何试图阻止小偷的？

lyrics.text: The expensive shops in a famous arcade near Piccadilly were just opening.
lyrics.translation: 皮卡迪利附近一个著名拱廊里的高档商店刚刚开始营业。

lyrics.text: At this time of the morning the arcade was almost empty.
lyrics.translation: 在这个早晨的这个时候，拱廊几乎空无一人。

lyrics.text: Mr. Taylor, the owner of a jewelry shop, was admiring a new window display.
lyrics.translation: 泰勒先生，一家珠宝店的老板，正在欣赏一个新的橱窗展示。

lyrics.text: Two of his assistants had been working busily since 8 o'clock and had only just finished.
lyrics.translation: 他的两个助手从8点开始就一直在忙碌地工作，刚刚才完成。

lyrics.text: Diamond necklaces and rings had been beautifully arranged on a background of black velvet.
lyrics.translation: 钻石项链和戒指被精美地摆放在黑色天鹅绒背景上。

lyrics.text: After gazing at the display for several minutes, Mr. Taylor went back into his shop.
lyrics.translation: 凝视展览几分钟后，泰勒先生回到了他的商店。

lyrics.text: The silence was suddenly broken when a large car with its headlights on and its horn blaring roared down the arcade.
lyrics.translation: 当一辆开着前灯、鸣着喇叭的大车呼啸着驶过拱廊时，寂静突然被打破了。

lyrics.text: It came to a stop outside the jewelers.
lyrics.translation: 它在珠宝店外停了下来。

lyrics.text: One man stayed at the wheel while two others with black stockings over their faces jumped out and smashed the window of the shop with iron bars.
lyrics.translation: 一名男子留在驾驶座上，而另外两名戴着黑色长筒袜遮脸的人跳出来，用铁棒砸碎了商店的窗户。

lyrics.text: While this was going on, Mr. Taylor was upstairs.
lyrics.translation: 当这一切发生的时候，泰勒先生正在楼上。

lyrics.text: He and his staff began throwing furniture out of the window.
lyrics.translation: 他和他的员工开始把家具扔出窗外。

lyrics.text: Chairs and tables went flying into the arcade.
lyrics.translation: 椅子和桌子飞进了拱廊。

lyrics.text: One of the thieves was struck by a heavy statue, but he was too busy helping himself to diamonds to notice any pain.
lyrics.translation: 其中一个小偷被一个沉重的雕像击中，但他忙于自取钻石，以至于没有感觉到任何疼痛。

lyrics.text: The raid was all over in three minutes, for the men scrambled back into the car and had moved off at a fantastic speed.
lyrics.translation: 突袭在三分钟内就结束了，因为那些人迅速爬回车里，以惊人的速度离开了。

lyrics.text: Just as it was leaving, Mr. Taylor rushed out and ran after it, throwing ashtrays and vases.
lyrics.translation: 正当它要离开的时候，泰勒先生冲了出来，追赶它，扔着烟灰缸和花瓶。

lyrics.text: But it was impossible to stop the thieves.
lyrics.translation: 但不可能阻止那些小偷。

lyrics.text: They had got away with thousands of pounds worth of diamonds.
lyrics.translation: 他们带着价值数千英镑的钻石逃脱了。
